remarks.para: One may be inoperative secured closed provided aircraft is not operated in known or forecast icing conditions.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:
If icing conditions are inadvertently encountered, reducing thrust on affected engine will minimize possible damage if ice is ingested.

numlitem.para: Operations into known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Placard on NAI VALVE switch Pilot’s Overhead Panel: "NAI VALVE INOP CLOSED". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: To secure NAI valve in the closed position:
Gain access to affected NAI valve through access door in nacelle strut.
Turn shaft hex stud to closed position.
With valve in the desired position, pull and rotate the lockout knob to the LOCKED CLOSED position.
Verify the fan air modulating valve is operative (AMM 36-12-04).
Restore aircraft to its required configuration.
